title: A Track winding back
brief_description: Presents a sketch of life in Gundagai, NSW around the turn of the century utilising contemporary photographs and written records. Covers architecture, fashion, medicine, politics, problems of workers, the departure of troops for the Boer War and the celebration of Commonwealth Day.
